Unique Temple replacement. Holds 2 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work of Music slot, 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Great Work of Music slot. +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points per turn.

O, wise Princess Zelda, throughout the ages you have defied evil and bore the burdens of your ancestors without complaint or struggle. Your wisdom has been passed down to you by the Gods, and those same Gods have entrusted you with your nation's fate. Will you accept, Princess Zelda? Will you allow Hyrule to become a civilization that stands the test of time?
